casebody.data:
DUKE ENERGY CORPORATION, A North Carolina Corporation, Tax Identification No. 56-0205520
v.
Wendell Corey MALCOLM and Callabridge/Granite, LLC. No. 379A06-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 22, 2007. Noelle E. Wooten, Charlotte, James H. Kelly, Jr., Winston-Salem, for Callabridge/Granite, LLC. James E. Scarbrough, Concord, for Malcolm. John W. Francisco, Irwin W. Hankins, III, Charlotte, for Duke Energy Corporation.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendants on the 19th day of January 2007 for rehearing of the decision of this Court pursuant to Rule 31, N.C. Rules of Appellate Procedure, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd day of January 2007."
